name: ApplyModelStoreAX2012
friendlyName: Apply a Model store of AX 2012
description: Does apply a Model store of an AX 2012 Environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path to of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: schemaName
inputs.label: Schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the schema to apply.

inputs.name: backupSchemaName
inputs.label: Backup schema name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the backup schema. (optional)

inputs.name: showModelStoreDetails
inputs.label: Show model store details
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the model store details be shown?

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step

instanceNameFormat: SDK4NET.de - Apply a Model store of AX2012: $(schemaName) - $(configurationFileName)
